publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-265 Ms Sandra White: Queen Mother's Hospital and Yorkhill Hospital, Glasgow-That the Parliament notes with concern the threat to maternity and children's services in Glasgow as a result of the maternity services review currently ongoing by NHS Greater Glasgow; further notes the excellent reputation of the Queen Mother's Maternity Hospital Glasgow and the special link between it and Yorkhill Children's Hospital, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to support the retention of these hospitals.
S2M-265 Queen Mother's Hospital and Yorkhill Hospital, Glasgow (lodged on 14 August 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-265 Queen Mother's Hospital and Yorkhill Hospital, Glasgow (lodged on 14 August 2003) Michael Matheson*
S2M-265 Queen Mother's Hospital and Yorkhill Hospital, Glasgow (lodged on 14 August 2003) Mr Rob Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-265 Queen Mother's Hospital and Yorkhill Hospital, Glasgow (lodged on 14 August 2003) Christine Grahame*
S2M-265 Queen Mother's Hospital and Yorkhill Hospital, Glasgow (lodged on 14 August 2003) Mr Stewart Maxwell*
